title: Calliostoma barbouri
text:
Calliostoma barbouri is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Calliostomatidae">Calliostomatidae</a>.
Distribution.
This species occurs in the <a href="Caribbean%20Sea">Caribbean Sea</a> and the <a href="Gulf%20of%20Mexico">Gulf of Mexico</a>.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 25 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 27 m. Maximum recorded depth is 192 m.
